quote.words: "How can we know the dancer from the dance?"
quote.author: William Butler Yeats

quote.words: "We're fools whether we dance or not, so we might as well dance."
quote.author: Japanese Proverb

quote.words: "The truest expression of a people is in its dance and in its music. Bodies never lie"
quote.author: Agnes de Mille

quote.words: "Dancing: the vertical expression of a horizontal desire legalized by music. "
quote.author: George Bernard Shaw

quote.words: "Dance is the only art of which we ourselves are the stuff of which it is made."
quote.author: Ted Shawn

quote.words: "To dance is to be out of yourself. Larger, more beautiful, more powerful."
quote.author: Agnes De Mille

quote.words: "Dance first. Think later. It's the natural order."
quote.author: Samuel Beckett
